content: Great post! I particularly liked the section on Conformance Testing & Certification, of course. FHIR probably reached the Peak of Inflated Expectations when John Halamka described it as the 'HTML of healthcare'.
John would be proud to know that he was 'peak hype' ;-0

FYI: I had posted a similar topic back after FHIR DevDays in Boston in June:
https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/4-implementers/topic/FHIR.20and.20the.20.22Gartner.20Hype.20Cycle.22.3F
